A little about me

BIO

My programming journey has been diverse and extensive. I began my journey in Silicon Valley, learning from close friends and comprehensive programs. After reaching a competent level with my skills in Javascript, I was motivated to apply my knowledge within startups.

Front-end Developer

Lokafy is an online tool used to connect travelers with locals who share similar interests
